review: This medication helped my reflux and my stomach pain but after 3 weeks my extremities started swelling. Will call my Physician for a different med.
Caused severe muscle cramps, headaches. Took away the pain from duodenal ulcers within 3 days.

I was recently hospitalized for 4 days with a duodenal ulcer. They ran PROTONIX through an IV--I was in miserable pain..Within 2 days, No Problems, and I could eat again. I'm now on 40mg 2x day, and soon decreasing to 1. It REALLY works, with No side effects!
